text-10.title: About
text-10.text: Bakery is a powerful responsive WordPress theme designed for bakery, cakery and food related shops. It comes with all features these shops need such as product post type, menu, order form, offer, gallery, news etc. The theme also includes the drag-drop page builder which lets you customize your specific needs with incredible ease.

text-11.title: Subscribe
text-11.text: [vu_newsletter submit_text="Subscribe"]Give us your email, and we shall send regular updates for new stuff and events.[/vu_newsletter]
